titleStmt.title: Saints memorials, or, Words fitly spoken, like apples of gold in pictures of silver being a collection of divine sentences / written and delivered by those late reverend and eminent ministers of the gospel, Mr. Edmund Calamy, Mr. Joseph Caryl, Mr. Ralph Venning, Mr. James Janeway.
titleStmt.author: Calamy, Edmund, 1600-1666.
Caryl, Joseph, 1602-1673.
Venning, Ralph, 1621?-1674.
Janeway, James, 1636?-1674.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
